title: Value of funds raised through crowdfunding globally 2014 to 2016
summary: Overall Amount in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Amount in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Amount in million U.S. dollars, about 762.52 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Amount in million U.S. dollars about 738.9 was reached at Year 2016
